title: Is Mark Zuckerberg David Rockefeller’s Grandson?
subtitle: We look into the conspiracy theory that Facebook founder Mark Zuckerberg's real name is Jacob Greenberg and he's the grandson of billionaire banker David Rockefeller.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Mark Zuckerberg's real name is Jacob Michael Greenberg and he is the grandson of billionaire David Rockefeller.
